title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a built-in model library (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) and a simple REST/CLI API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node or browsers via fetch.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration layer; use Ollama models as LLM or chat components inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, admin, model manager) – previously “Ollama WebUI”, now “Open WebUI”.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, Android compatible.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, history, syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template: load PDFs → embeddings → chat with Llama via Ollama.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: n8n community node to call Ollama models inside no-code workflows.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration; use Ollama models as generators or chatters in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming, chat and embedding APIs.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and model pre-load.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & GPU) for Ollama with one-line run commands.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that pipes selected notes to Ollama for summarization, translation, or Q&A.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-rgthree
summary: ComfyUI custom node set for running Ollama models inside Stable-Diffusion workflows.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve example deploying Ollama models for scalable inference across GPUs.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda 8 connector that calls Ollama models from BPMN service tasks.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot bringing Ollama models to any server with slash commands.
